definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
Bairin Right banner or Baarin Baruun khoshuu in Chifeng 赤峰[Chi4 feng1], Inner Mongolia
Bairin Left banner of Baarin Züün khoshuu in Chifeng 赤峰[Chi4 feng1], Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: Bahrain's strong civil society fostered a tradition of political activism.
sentences.chinese: 巴林发达的公民社会促成了一种能动的政治传统。

sentences.english: Today, many Bahrainis say they are afraid to use social media.
sentences.chinese: 今天，许多巴林人表示他们不敢使用社交媒体。

sentences.english: King Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa of Bahrain tried pacifying his subjects with cash.
sentences.chinese: 巴林国王萨勒曼试图用金钱安抚他的臣民。

sentences.english: We are very interested in an exclusive arrangement with your factoryfor the promotion of your products in Bahrain.
sentences.chinese: 盼望能成为贵公司独家代理，促销在巴林市场的货品。

sentences.english: Other agreements in 1880 and 1892 sealed the protectorate status of Bahrain to the British.
sentences.chinese: 1892年的协定确定了巴林是英国的保护国。

sentences.english: Bahrain's main opposition party, Wefaq, is boycotting the poll.
sentences.chinese: 巴林的主要反对派维法格党呼吁抵制选举。

sentences.english: What was wrong with it in Bahrain?
sentences.chinese: 巴林站赛车有什么问题呢？

sentences.english: It is mainy produced in Changhua, Zhejiang Province, and Balin, Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 主产地为浙江昌化和内蒙古巴林。

sentences.english: In Bahrain, the conflict between Sunnis and Shiites is clearly central.
sentences.chinese: 在巴林，逊尼派和什叶派穆斯林的冲突显然是焦点。

sentences.english: Oman and Bahrain have free trade agreements with the United States.
sentences.chinese: 阿曼和巴林与美国签订了自由贸易协定。

sentences.english: Bahrain's legal system appeared in the Safavid Dynasty in the 16th century.
sentences.chinese: 巴林现代法律制度肇始于16世纪的萨法维王朝。

sentences.english: At an additional points, cost Balin can replace his two-handed axe with Durin's Axe.
sentences.chinese: 可以支付额外费用，将巴林双手斧换成都灵之斧来用。

sentences.english: Hopefully we can take another step in Bahrain next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 希望我们在下周的巴林站能再上一层楼。

sentences.english: The Saudis only need a draw from their final match against Bahrain in Palembang to progress.
sentences.chinese: 沙特只要在小组赛最后一轮与巴林打平便可晋级。

sentences.english: Bahraini security forces later opened fire on the funeral proceedings.
sentences.chinese: 随后，巴林警方在葬礼上开火。

definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2

definition: Sudan/sultan (ruler of some Muslim states, esp. Ottoman Emperor)
Turkmenistan/Republic of Turkmenistan, former Soviet republic adjoining Iran
